about.title: Ortvest is an IT studio
about.subtitle: We solve real business problems with design and technology. No fluff — clear process, solid delivery.
about.why1: No fluff — we focus on what drives growth.

faq.title: Common questions
faq.subtitle: Quick answers about how we work.
faq.q1: How long does a typical project take?
faq.a1: Depends on scope. A landing page: 2–4 weeks. A full web app: 2–4 months. We'll give a timeline after discovery.
faq.a2: Yes. We work with startups and established businesses. We adapt to your budget and timeline.
faq.q3: What's included in the discovery phase?
faq.a3: Requirements gathering, scope definition, tech stack recommendation, and a clear roadmap and quote.
faq.a4: Yes. After launch we offer maintenance, updates, and support packages.
faq.a5: Next.js, React, Vue, NestJS, Go, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, React Native. We choose based on your project.
faq.a6: Fill out the contact form or email us. We'll reply within 24 hours and set up a short call.

metadata.title: Ortvest — IT Studio | Web & Mobile Development, UI/UX Design, Marketing
metadata.description: Ortvest is an IT studio. We build web and mobile apps, UI/UX design, and marketing that converts. Get in touch for a free consultation.
